unittests.services.test_base_services module¶

class unittests.services.test_base_services.TestBaseServices(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

classmethod setUpClass()¶

Hook method for setting up class fixture before running tests in the class.

tearDown()¶

Hook method for deconstructing the test fixture after testing it.

test_get()¶

confirm the get returns response data when status code is 200

test_post()¶

confirm post method if passed the correct data & returns response data when status code is 200

test_post_error_response()¶

confirm post method raises api exception when status code is not 200

test_put()¶

confirm that put returns response data when status code is 200

test_bookings_sort_key()¶

confirm that the sorting key sorts bookings first by status (active ones first) and then by booking_id

test_get_bookings_for_user()¶
test_update_booking()¶

confirm that failure is propagated from put and update-booking returns false

unittests.services.test_car_services module¶

class unittests.services.test_car_services.TestCarServices(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

setUp()¶

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

classmethod setUpClass()¶

Hook method for setting up class fixture before running tests in the class.

tearDown()¶

Hook method for deconstructing the test fixture after testing it.

test_get_all_available_cars()¶

confirm that available and only available cars are returned

test_get_one_car()¶

confirm that getting one car by id returns the correct car

test_search_cars_by_cost_hour_range()¶

confirm that when providing the range of cost per hour, the correct data is returned

test_search_cars_by_id()¶

confirm that searching cars by car_id passes the correct args to post

test_transform_location()¶

confirm that numeric coordinates are transformed into user-friendly strings

test_update_one_car()¶

confirm that when providing car_id and new values, the car is updated and success is returned
